title: 关于mineTweaker魔改注魔
author: 一串字母
txt_content:
mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("draconicHelm", <draconicevolution:wyvernHelm>, [<draconicevolution:awakenedCore>, <draconicevolution:awakenedCore>, <draconicevolution:awakenedCore>, <draconicevolution:awakenedCore>, <draconicevolution:awakenedCore>, <draconicevolution:awakenedCore>,<draconicevolution:draconicIngot>,<draconicevolution:draconicIngot>,<draconicevolution:draconicIngot>,<draconicevolution:draconicIngot>], "ignis 20, potentia 10, permutatio 12", <draconicevolution:draconicHelm> , 15);
这一行哪里错了啊？

replies.author: 君雨时
replies.txt_content: mods.thaumcraft.Infusion.addRecipe("ICHORCLOTH_HELM_GEM", <DraconicEvolution:wyvernHelm>, [<DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>, <DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>, <DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>, <DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>, <DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>, <DraconicEvolution:awakenedCore>,<DraconicEvolution:draconicIngot>,<DraconicEvolution:draconicIngot>,<DraconicEvolution:draconicIngot>,<DraconicEvolution:draconicIngot>], "ignis 20, potentia 10, permutatio 12", <DraconicEvolution:draconicHelm> , 15);    你这个是物品没对上

replies.txt_content:
qq480924272 发表于 2020-4-13 14:16

replies.txt_content:
看起来没有什么问题

replies.author: qq480924272
replies.txt_content:
一串字母 发表于 2020-4-13 14:18
我是想添加一个龙套的注魔，那应该要怎么写？
写原版的研究名字
比如炼金学傀儡学或者其他神秘附属的研究名

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
qq480924272 发表于 2020-4-13 14:20
写原版的研究名字
比如炼金学傀儡学或者其他神秘附属的研究名
ttresearch.name.ICHOR比如这个是灵液的研究名字

replies.txt_content:
